timeline.message:
EQL: Improve retrieval of results

Instead of retrieving whole SearchHit, get just a reference and postpone
the document retrieval when assembling the final results.
Remove sort information from results to make them consistent
Move TumblingWindow under the sequence package

timeline.bodyText:
@jrodewig Normally these need to be set as well however I didn't want to make this PR longer. For event queries we do return these fields however the docs doesn't include them for sequences.
Considering the tight deadline, not sure what's the easiest fix until the next release?

timeline.message:
Remove left-over comment
Explicitly drop the state machine before returning the results

Field extractors are used only for ordinals so make them use docvalues
by default

Don't retrieve source while matching
Move fetch source handling inside SourceGenerator
Add more fields to generated SearchHit
